Reviews.Content: outside hotels look fine price lobby looks ok downhill cleaning staff left cleaning supplies nonsmoking smelled smoke tried windows found screen windows cloudy havent cleaned facet kitchen left running 400 morning garbage truck shaking 545 am person started shower sound pipes fire alarm worst hotels ive stayed
